rules.natural: Either the conservation plan is approved by the curator or, if the Renaissance sculpture passes initial assessment, then the Renaissance sculpture undergoes cleaning.
If the conservation process triggers an internal review, then the conservation process requires an external consultant.
Either the conservation process is approved by the director or the conservation process does not require an external consultant.
If the Renaissance sculpture requires restoration, then the Renaissance sculpture has structural damage.
Either the Renaissance sculpture requires restoration or the museum has funding for the conservation project.
If the museum has funding for the conservation project, then the conservation project is completed successfully.
If the Renaissance sculpture has insurance coverage, then should the conservation project not be completed successfully, the Renaissance sculpture is not exhibitable.
If the Renaissance sculpture undergoes cleaning, then the Renaissance sculpture has structural damage.
If the Renaissance sculpture receives reinforcement, then the conservation project is completed successfully.
Either the Renaissance sculpture passes initial assessment or the Renaissance sculpture fails initial assessment.
If the Renaissance sculpture fails initial assessment, then the Renaissance sculpture receives reinforcement.

Provided that it is not the case that if the conservation process violates preservation guidelines then the Renaissance sculpture is not exhibitable, the conservation process triggers an internal review.
Under the condition that the conservation project is not completed successfully, the conservation process violates preservation guidelines.
Should the conservation project not be completed successfully, the Renaissance sculpture is exhibitable.

(A3 → G).natural: If the museum has funding for the conservation project, then the conservation project is completed successfully.

(A5 → (¬G → ¬A4)).natural: If the Renaissance sculpture has insurance coverage, then should the conservation project not be completed successfully, the Renaissance sculpture is not exhibitable.

(A6 → A1).natural: If the Renaissance sculpture undergoes cleaning, then the Renaissance sculpture has structural damage.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: Either the Renaissance sculpture undergoes cleaning or the Renaissance sculpture receives reinforcement.

(A8 → A6).natural: If the Renaissance sculpture passes initial assessment, then the Renaissance sculpture undergoes cleaning.
